ygData.subject: Re: bad mouthers
ygData.msgSnippet: For reporting bad behavior, even better than screen shots, is the new /report command. It will capture the last 10 lines of text in your chat box and send it.
ygData.messageBody:
For reporting bad behavior, even better than screen shots, is the new
/report command. It will capture the last 10 lines of text in your chat box
and send it.

Jose Muela wrote:

> From: Jose Muela <redspieder@...>
>
> if someone is giveing a hard time i suggest taking a screan shot of the
> chat so you can email it in an attatchment also i highly suggest that on
> occation take a screan shot of all of your important stuff including
> your lvl just in case you loose your character so you have proof
> positive that it is true
>
> just a thought
>
> Sincerly your friendly nieborhood homo
> Jose AKA Redspider
